text: @GovMikeDeWine @nanwhaley @CDCgov Gov DeWine, you should’ve mandated face coverings for all of Ohio. You are spineless & have chosen party over the health of Ohioans. #Shameful #COVID19 #peoplearedying #spineless #MandateMasks
